ygData.subject: RE: Are you all at work?
ygData.msgSnippet: haha, not for me, love being able to surf while at work, besides, my software company here makes Stock option software, so no fun and games in that, in my
ygData.messageBody:
haha, not for me, love being able to surf while at work, besides, my
software company here makes Stock option software, so no fun and games in
that, in my opinion anyway.



>From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Are you all at work?
>Date: Wed, 25 Aug 1999 17:14:34 -0400
>
>From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>
>I work in software too. Though I sometimes wonder whether the www access
>is
>a blessing or a curse :)
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Heather Daley [mailto:blushn@...]
>Sent: 1999/08/25 5:12 PM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Are you all at work?
>
>
>From: "Heather Daley" <blushn@...>
>
>I am at work and I must say I do the same thing, surf the web for EQ info
>and check my mail, while at work, but I do manage to get my work done.
>Kinda
>
>helps when you work for a software company, they are a little more flexible
>with web access and surfing, well, at least my company is.
>
>Bree Wyndsdale
>
>
> >From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Are you all at work?
> >Date: Wed, 25 Aug 1999 14:43:32 -0400
> >
> >From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
> >
> >Just wondering...
> >
> >...if I'm the only one who sits at work all day, reading these messages
>as
> >they come in. Its bad enough I play all night. Now, between surfing for
>EQ
> >info, reading the newsgroup, and reading this list, its a wonder I get
> >anything done at all!
> >
